spells.name: Cleanse
spells.description: Cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +25) and also removes several afflictions.

spells.name: Ghostbane Dirge, Mass
spells.description: As ghostbane dirge, but affects multiple creatures.

spells.name: Snake Staff
spells.description: Transforms staff or other wood into snakes to fight for you.
